data.why:
I have written a module that provides the Last Trade Date (LTD) and
    LTD-1 for any month in any year. This allows us (poor souls) in the
    financial industry to check to see if the current day is one of
    those where we need to report to the SEC or our clients. It is leap
    year aware and, obviously, does not return weekends as possible last
    trade days.
